Recommendations World Health Organization ( WHO ) Joint United Nations Programme ( UNAIDS ) emphasize SMC consider efficacious intervention HIV prevention country region heterosexual epidemic , high HIV low male circumcision prevalence . In Sub Saharan Africa , 14 country include Uganda select scale SMC , country target achieve 80 % circumcision prevalence 2015 maintain till 2025 . The scale would avert 20 percent new infection among men woman . However SMC program face challenge low uptake SMC old sexually active men might high risk HIV . The need increase SMC coverage among men high risk HIV require tool measure individual HIV risk . Rakai Health Sciences Program receive funding carry individual randomize , unblinded , two-arm 1:1 trial comprise total 968 men ( 484 men per study arm ) Rakai Community Cohort Study ( RCCS ) ass whether HIV Counseling Testing ( HCT ) , enhance measurement communication HIV risk ( eHCT ) , increase uptake SMC lead behavior modification among HIV-negative sexually active men age 15-49 year Rakai District , Uganda . The study use risk nomogram develop Rakai Community Cohort Study data measure individual HIV risk intervention group standard HCT control arm . All men enrol follow six month ascertain circumcision status collect brief information sexual behavior number sex partner , use alcohol sex , detail data sexual partner etc.The study also measure acceptability index among men .
